title: My Pixel 2 XL has the camera fatal error message. completed factory reset, no luck. what now?
content: I followed all the steps in the help section up to and including a factory reset. The camera still does not work, giving the error message "Camera keeps stopping." I looked for 30 min on the google help website for a way to return the phone and get a new one as it is still under warranty, but the links kept taking me in circles. Please help!
